title: Eric II, Duke of Mecklenburg
text:
Eric II, Duke of Mecklenburg (; 3 September 1483 – 21/22 December 1508) was <a href="Duke%20of%20Mecklenburg">Duke of Mecklenburg</a>, a son of <a href="Magnus%20II%2C%20Duke%20of%20Mecklenburg">Magnus II, Duke of Mecklenburg</a>, and his wife <a href="Sophie%20of%20Pomerania-Stettin">Sophie of Pomerania-Stettin</a>.
Eric ruled <a href="Duchy%20of%20Mecklenburg-Schwerin">Mecklenburg-Schwerin</a> jointly with his brothers <a href="Henry%20V%2C%20Duke%20of%20Mecklenburg">Henry V</a> and <a href="Albert%20VII%2C%20Duke%20of%20Mecklenburg">Albert VII</a> and his uncle <a href="Balthasar%2C%20Duke%20of%20Mecklenburg">Balthasar</a> after his father's death on 27 December 1503. Eric himself probably died on 21 December or 22 December 1508. He was buried in the <a href="Doberan%20Abbey">Doberan Minster</a> in <a href="Bad%20Doberan">Bad Doberan</a>. He never married and died childless.
